name: Create tasks in Onfleet from new rows on Google Sheets
description: Every time you already got all your action items on a spreadsheet Google Sheets, Make will automatically create a Task in Onfleet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ThcB9t1LxphP0bfBO-Dw1uFzHpdn0_2UXiD4U3kf_EI/edit?usp=sharing)
